function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Coupling of environmentally efficient vehicles and technical solutions may lead to increased urban mobility and transportation activities, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ramping up the uptake of low emission vehicles and constructing more electric car charging points may increase human interactions within urban environments, potentially contributing to the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facilitating a step change towards sustainable improvements in air quality may lead to increased construction activities, potentially causing airborne particle pollution and respiratory health risks for urban residents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in scaling up battery value chain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks of raw material supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased traffic volume and raw material demand from electric vehicles","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper implementation of digital technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Security vulnerabilities in digital infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data privacy and compliance with regulations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education, information, and awareness integration into educational curricula may hinder adoption of ce principles and lifecycle systems thinking","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate platforms for collaboration and public-private partnerships may impede the sharing of information and hinder breakthroughs in materials science and engineering","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability initiatives in public procurement and infrastructure may lead to continued reliance on non-sustainable practices","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unrestricted air travel contributing to the spread of pandemics, such as viral influenza types like covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution and transportation/industrialization contributing to critical issues highlighted by the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-resilience of peer-to-peer p2p or sharing economy models to global systemic shocks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in cargo shipping leading to increased airfreight costs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote working and telemedicine becoming more prevalent","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in primary energy consumption due to economic slowdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare delivery systems for mass casualties and emergencies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Protectionism and in-ward looking policies on exports and tariff reductions/waivers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in infectious hospital waste due to the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in online purchasing leading to reduced foot traffic in small businesses, impacting their viability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of regenerative agriculture and urban agriculture leading to food insecurity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of global value chains due to exploitation of the pandemic for sustainable growth by certain countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underutilization of offices and commercial spaces during lockdown leading to ventilation issues and increased energy consumption.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of modular construction techniques leading to potential gaps and spaces for disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Renovation and refurbishment of existing buildings without considering circularity and sustainability principles.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive national-level policies for circular economy ce leading to inefficient resource use and waste management.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsustainable focus on business competitiveness and profitability over general well-being","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers to implementing circular economy principles","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-cultural considerations and operational challenges","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High potential for disease transmission in crowded health club facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance leading to unsanitary conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with health and safety regulations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in health club facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions caused by covid-19 impact’s anonymity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable management of facility functions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International collaboration and control toward preserving public health may be insufficient or ineffective","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on the post-occupancy evaluation poe of health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in evaluating and proposing effective pandemic precautionary measures for health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 within sports facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic prevention measures in sports facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate facility management and operational practices for pandemic prevention","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of covid-19 precautionary measures from a global perspective.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematically conducting an indicative walkthrough of a case study health club facility in saudi arabia.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identifying recommendations for improving operation of the case study facility.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation and unsatisfactory temperature control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growth of fungi and accumulation of dust","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ergonomics and utilization of space","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of application of research in health club facilities may lead to ineffective disease prevention and mitigation strategies.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
